page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: The village hall committee is responsible under 3 trustees for the maintenance of the former school.They organise certain fund-raising events, keep-fit, whist drives,a summer horticultural show and the annual May Fair when there are stalls inside and games on the adjacent playing fields. The playing field committee ensures the good condition of the latter. A Mother & Toddler group is held every Monday. The Cricket Club has several members from the village,the remainder being young people from neighbouring villages. The Women's Institute and the Veterans (Over 60's) Club held jointly with Finchingfield have two meetings a year in the Village Hall.The ladies social committee have a sale late in May to raise money for a Harvest Supper and childrens annual Christmas party.
